head.title: Нужна помощь
head.summary: Direct and indirect support for the development of BibleTime
head.keywords: BibleTime, Help us, Help BibleTime, Software

section.title: Please help us ...
section.para: Our aim is to develop BibleTime into a really mature Bible study application that can by everyone. To ahieve this, we need your help. There are different possibilities for supporting the BibleTime project directly and indirectly:

section.title: Вы хотите молиться?
section.para: Молиться может каждый. Если вы молитесь о проектах Sword и BibleTime, то вы помогаете также как и другие участники команды проекта BibleTime.

section.title: Would you like to support the developers?
section.para: On the team page, you can find information about the members of the BibleTime team and ways how you can support them. If you like using BibleTime, but don't have the time or knowledge to help with the development yourself, you might want to consider this possibility.

section.title: Умеете программировать?
section.para: Do you know how to program in C++? Are you familiar with the KDE programming interface or are motivate to learn it? If you have time to regularly work on the BibleTime source code we ask you to join our team. If you want to do so, please read the page Join us.

section.title: Умеете писать документацию?
section.para: Do you think you would be good in working on BibleTime's english documentation? If you think you are, please read the page Join us.

section.title: Умеете хорошо переводить с английского на другой язык?
section.para: BibleTime should be useable for everyone. That's why we need a translation into your language, if it's not yet available. If you decide to start working on a translation please contact us at info@bibletime.info to see whether the translation was not yet started by another team member. We will provide you with the files which should be translated.
You can find more information about the translation process on the page translation.
